entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
